title: Publishing & Content Assistant (with TikTok + Book Support Skills)
job_overview:
Serene Wisdom Works is a U.S.-based publishing company creating impactful books in AI, wellness, dementia care, and survival. We’re seeking a highly organized and creative Publishing & Content Assistant to work remotely and help manage day-to-day operations across our publishing and marketing workflows.

You will support a range of tasks, including:

Creating and posting TikTok videos for book promotion

Reaching out to book reviewers and keeping track of responses

Editing, proofreading, and formatting book manuscripts

Uploading final files to Amazon KDP and other publishing platforms

Coordinating with freelancers and managing timelines

Assisting with book launches, marketing assets, and content planning

Managing and responding to customer messages and inquiries

This is a remote position for someone who can take initiative, follow instructions, and help keep projects moving efficiently. We’re looking for someone who’s both creative and dependable, with a passion for content and publishing.
